column3: 2015| of nora teresa tiernan. nora teresa (mc. grath) tiernan
column8: 2015 at manor care in king of prussia
column12: nora has lived in conshohocken for over 50 years. she was a member of st. matthew's rc church of conshohocken
column13: pa. nora teresa was very proud of being born in ireland
column14: and she enjoyed going back to visiting ireland and listening to irish music. she was a sweet natured women who was known for her great sense of humor and strong faith. survivors include her daughter: mary tiernan of conshohocken
column15: pa; also survived by many beloved nieces
column17: cousins & friends and her duncan puppy. she was predeceased by her husband
column19: patrick mc. grath and margaret (ryan). her funeral mass will be held on monday
column21: 2015 at 10:30 am from the st. matthew's rc church
column23: conshohocken. clergy: fr. j. thomas heron officiating. friends may call on sunday evening june 14
column26: 2015 from 9:00 to 10:00 am at the moore
column30: pa. interment will be in st. matthew's cemetery
column32: pa. memorial contributions may be made in her memory to: st. matthew's rc church
